item.title: blog using org and hugo
item.description: References : https://ddavis.io/ Copied shamelessly from here* https://seds.nl/ My ultimate plan https://github.com/jethrokuan/braindump https://github.com/jethrokuan/cortex [for backlinks] Questions : I have made a base site using hugo static generator. The posts are written with org-mode. The plugin `ox-hugo` converts the org file to markdown and places it to the posts folder of the hugo site folder. I have also used roam capture template so that the placeholder for tags and categories are predefined in new org files.
